Articles.Content:
First off, I'm new around here, please be gentle

The video here shows an entire timelapse of me launching for Duna and coming back in one go. There were a few glitches and pauses here and there so if you see the screen flicker around, It's just me going to the KSC and back. The video is complimented by Royalty Free Music, of which details can be found in the description on the actual YouTube video. There is also no commentary, just to keep it nice and relatively short. The design is super efficient and boasts LOADS of Delta-V if used right. Mechjeb was used but only for really tedious and precise burns. It's mostly there for information. Everything else was manual and the rocket is STOCK!

Enjoy

Any feedback will be greatly appreciated. Just make sure that it's constructive and not just talking down on me. Thanks!

Edited September 30, 2014 by Xenro66
Forgot a piece of information
